BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Velella, S.6891-A, and Assembly Member Kaufman, A.9573, "AN ACT authorizing the city of New York to reconvey its interest in certain real property acquired by in rem tax foreclosure in the borough of The Bronx to the person or persons who would have inherited said property from former owner Frank Switay, deceased, notwithstanding expiration of the two year period within which application may be made to the city to release its interest in property thus acquired; Block No. 3978, Lot No. 4 on tax map for the borough of The Bronx".

State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senators Schneiderman, Montgomery, Sampson, Stachowski, S.1649, and Assembly Members Dinowitz, Klein, Ramirez, Greene, Kaufman, et al, A.2798, "AN ACT to dedicate the Jerome Park Reservoir tract in the Bronx as parkland".

Communication from the Mayor - "AN ACT to amend the tax law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the seizure and forfeiture of vehicles used to transport unstamped or unlawfully stamped packages of cigarettes and the imposition of civil penalties for counterfeit cigarette tax stamps."  S.4153/A.1787-A
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - "AN ACT in relation to authorizing the city of New York to grant easements over portions of parkland known as Riverside Park in the Borough of Manhattan to the National Park Service for the construction and operation of public facilities in connection with the General Grant National Memorial."  S.6692/A.8106A
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - "AN ACT in relation to authorizing the city of New York to grant easements over portions of parkland known as Riverside Park in the Borough of Manhattan to the National Park Service for the construction and operation of public facilities in connection with the General Grant National Memorial." S.4153/A.1787-A
